content: प्रगृह्यं {@--1@} A vowel which is not liable to the rules of {%Saṃdhi%} or euphony and which is allowed to be written and pronounced separately; ईदूदेद्द्बिवचनं प्रगृह्यं <ls>P. I. 1. 11</ls> ({%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} the final ई, ऊ and ए of the dual terminations of a word or any grammatical form). {@--2@} Remembrance. {@--3@} A sentence.
